name: Galactiball
description:
Short game about playing ball games with planets made for Ludum Dare 38 Compo in 15 hours.

A lot of things I dont really like about this but think it turned out alright seeing as I rushed it out in 15 hours. Really wanted to add 80's disco music, but had no time and/or skill to get that done.

To play, just extract and play the .exe.

Twitter:@JamesBriggs123

EDIT: Re-uploaded because I'm an idiot and forgot to include data file.
